title: Coast of Lagoa da Conceição
content:
The Lagoon of Conceição is even a great option for those who like to clap and shake. Still, it offers many possibilities of leisure and fun.
Going by boat, for example, is a common practice and provides tourists with wonderful views. The tip is to take a stroll along the shore of the lagoon and do one of the tours.

figure.alt: Photo of Coast of Lagoa da Conceição
